item.title: Welcome to COVID-19 Updates
item.dc:creator: ZIYAO WANG (Billy)
item.description:
Welcome to our new blog. The first blog (`Blog 1`) is the COVID-19 updates in the United States.
Firstly, this blog will provide an interactive table for users/readers to explore the relevant information by themselves. It will not only offer them a chance to obtain an overview of the COVID-19 circumstance in the US but also understand the relevant data or statistics better.
Secondly, it will construct a numeric summary table to support the related story which helps the readers to understand the updated information regarding COVID-19 in the US comprehensively.
**We hope you enjoy the story and find some interesting insights!**
